name: Bean Guy: Rogue Elements
description:
Bean Guy : Rogue elements is a cute action roguelite for mobile with a great diversity of classes, abilities, items and enemies. It is currently in development by a single developer and game designer.

  • Master the elements : every class has abilities based on earth, water, fire and air, each with its own personality.
  •  Personalise your build : every run gives you opportunities to choose new abilities and new equipments. Combine elements or try maxing one, play according to your style.
  • Control the run : Currently there are 15 zones to explore during your run, each with a set of items to obtain. Strategic choices give you agency over your build.
  • Casual or not : Play the game at your pace, you can do theory-crafting to be on top or casually dodge bullets and still succeed.
  • Auto-saving : The game auto-saves your progression so you can quit whenever you want.

ALPHA VERSION DISCLAIMERS :

  • No progression system yet : for now the game is an endless loop, but I plan to add a finish point as well as persistent upgrades like in any roguelite.
  • More content to come! There are quiet not enough items and enemies. Also there are only two classes for now.
  • No automatic updates : For now you will have to re-download the game to get updates when they come.
  • Bad balancing
  • Bugs, obviously

Known Issues :

  • The tutorial sucks!
  • When you finish the tutorial you might encounter a strange visual bug on your first run. Restart the app to avoid the problem.

Update plan :

  1. Optional bosses with unique loot
  2. Progression between runs
  3. More classes
  4. Visual upgrades
